name: Under the Sky World
description:
"Under the Sky World" is an orthodox casual RPG game.
Players are in the era of the popular virtual world,
One day, by chance, I entered the most popular game "Under the Sky World"!
When I entered, I accidentally found that the game was invaded by a virus.
Players need to find evil hackers and stop this virtual world from being destroyed!




KARIN
It is Karine's avatar in SW, with cheating item given by her father.
When she was playing, she found that SW was invaded by hackers.
Can KARIN successfully save the world?


SAORI
She is Karine's good friend at school.
She was fascinated by Woutube and started to be a streamer.
She has a NEET brother, and she is disgusted with such a brother.


MIRIN
An agent entrusted to enter the SW to find the source of the virus.
Meet KARIN in SW, and regard her as a strong enemy.






  • Classic RPG gameplay
  • Diverse Mission System
  • Rich storyline
developers: サークル☆フェアリーフラワー
